# Load libraries
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

# Generating unique placeholder names for NA values in the "run" column 
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
metadata <- read.csv("datasets/clean_data/metadata_clean.csv")

metadata <- metadata %>%
  mutate(Run = ifelse(
    is.na(Run),
    paste0("sample_", seq_len(sum(is.na(Run)))),
    Run
  ))

write_csv(metadata, "metadata_updated.csv")

```
